ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is the Hell that you were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is the Hell that you were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Now this is the Hell of which you were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is hell with which you were threatened.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “This is hell, which you were promised.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is Hell which you were promised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the hell with which you were threatened.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is Gehenna, then, the same that you were promised;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is hell which ye were promised (if ye followed him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is the Hell you were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Yonder is Hell, which ye were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is the hell you had been promised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is Hell which you were promised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This, then is Gehenna (Hell), that which you were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is Hellfire, which you were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:63] This is Hell, which you were promised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is hell which you were promised) in the life of the world.
